messages.subject: Nambokucho Rai Sword w/ Toku Hozon papers for Sale
messages.msgSnippet: List, A friend has recently moved back Stateside after many years in Japan. To pay the bills, she s selling one of her swords: a nice Nambokucho Nakajima-Rai
messages.messageBody:
List,

A friend has recently moved back Stateside after many
years in Japan. To pay the bills, she's selling one of
her swords: a nice Nambokucho Nakajima-Rai with
Tokubetsu Hozon NBTHK papers.

Asking price is $12,500. Anyone interested, contact me
*off list* and I will forward her photos to you (about
1.2 meg zip file). The photos are good quality.

Curran
